name: Yellow Pages Scraper
description: Scrape addresses, phone numbers, categories, and names from Yellow Page listings. Customizable Yellow Pages API to crawl and download all contact data.
author: Petr Cermak

example_output_json_response.name: Golden State Dental Group
example_output_json_response.address: 1601 N Long Beach Blvd, Compton, CA 90221

full_readme_text: Yellow Pages Scraper is an Apify actor for scraping information from Yellow Pages listings....
